general_education.ge_overlap: 9 units satisfied by major coursework: UD Areas 2or5, 3, 4

american_institutions.overlap: may be satisfied in GE Areas 3B, 4, UD 3, UD 4

upper_division.course_name: Writing in the Humanities & Interdisciplinary Arts
Digital Media: Platforms, People, and the Planet

notes: String: Students must complete a written reflective statement as part of the application process.
String: A major course of study plan must be completed and submitted at least 1 year prior to graduation.
String: Students must meet with department advisor(s) and select a suggested major advisor.
String: The major course of study plan must be completed in consultation with the suggested major advisor and other departments involved in the program.

String: Preparation of the Interdisciplinary Studies major worksheet and evaluation of General Education and graduation requirements must be done in consultation with the Associate Dean for Undergraduate Education.
String: Diploma and transcript will contain the title 'Interdisciplinary Studies' followed by the exact title of the major listed in the Major Form.
